property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers." - Jazal Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Metal is scarce, smiths are pricey, and plate mail is heavy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings disturb more than air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {X}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X and gain all creature types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unaware of Lorwyn's diversity, it sees only itself, reflected a thousand times over.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Palace Jailer enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. When Palace Jailer enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until an opponent becomes the monarch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take a quiet moment to reflect on your sins." - Cleph, Order of Redeemed Souls

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As this conflict grows, it gets harder to prevent the city from breaking down. How much longer can we keep this machinery balanced?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stonehorn Dignitary enters the battlefield, target opponent skips their next combat phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It did not escape the ambassador's notice that the sound of war drums could also marshal the city to attention.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The echo of silence is music to my ears."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fblthp, the Lost enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead. When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mind whirled with grand plans, never thinking of what might happen if he were to succeed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the land dwellers know the coast is no longer the border between our realms. A new age of empire has begun."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Ninja of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return any number of target nonland, nontoken permanents you control to their owners' hands. Draw a card for each card returned to your hand this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The results of Rashmi's experimentation forced her to consider the possibility that multitudinous realities existed beyond her own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be." - Agosto, Azorius imperator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As True-Name Nemesis enters the battlefield, choose a player. True-Name Nemesis has protection from the chosen player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere." - Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If everything in the Gurmag Swamp hungers for human flesh, what bait could be more effective?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all." - Bishop Cawle of Elgaud

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her triumph came not from escaping her death, but in claiming her independence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats. A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed." - Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) {2}{GU}{GU}: Mill two cards, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from Humans Pay 1 life, Sacrifice another creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature and draw a card. {B}{B}, Discard a card: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now that's dangerous."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Alesha, Who Smiles at Death attacks, you may pay {WB}{WB}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. Prowess When Bedlam Reveler enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Dreadhorde Arcanist attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to Dreadhorde Arcanist's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The storm rages and the earth breaks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exquisite Firecraft deals 4 damage to any target. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, this spell can't be countered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra's gift set her apart and others aflame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Engineer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. {R}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Return target artifact card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the molten rains fall, entire landscapes melt and flow away in rivulets of fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The calligraphy of combat is written with strokes of sudden blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. Ferocious - That creature also gains trample until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact you don't control. Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beauty is in the eye of the exploder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tiniest mouse speaks louder to me than all the festival crowds on Tin Street."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kill the weak so they can't drag the strong down to their level. This is true compassion." - Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands from the top of your library. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The essence of nature is change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all." - Sildark, artificer of Omu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as there is a single shred of life, there is hope." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life. When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Always carry two spears." - Mokgar, Kalonian hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a legendary creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the kumo attacked the monks' sacred shrine, a mournful toll for help echoed through the forest. Thus began the Battle of Silk, which would last six years." - Great Battles of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Whenever a creature with defender enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. Each creature you control with defender assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have flying and haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forked tails rustled. Talons clicked. A lone sliver streaked overhead like jagged lightning, and the hive thundered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards. Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see you've learned nothing, Chandra. You'd still put a match to something rather than understand it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast instant and sorcery spells with mana value X or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a creature you control, exile that card instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves. If you do, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {2}: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can't cast noncreature spells with mana value greater than the number of lands that player controls. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The eyes let flow with tears, then blood, then the very soul - the whole wrung inside out, dripping down into the blackened puddle of the past.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if it entered from your graveyard or you cast it from your graveyard, return Prized Amalgam from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Exile target player's graveyard. • Destroy target artifact. • Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Face-down creatures you control get +0/+1. Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakshasa trade in secrets, amassing wealth from their careful revelation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Saproling you control dies, Slimefoot, the Stowaway deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life. {4}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Jhoira restored the Weatherlight, a mushroom growing in its hold unexpectedly became her first crew member.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tidehollow Sculler enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Tidehollow Sculler leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Held aloft by metabolized magic, trygons are ravenous for sources of mystic fuel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {3}, {T} or {U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken know it is not of this world, so they know that this world is not the only one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked. {T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned." "And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card you've cycled or discarded this turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The embodiment of yearning, forever drifting the deserts to find what had once made it whole.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Leveler enters the battlefield, exile all cards from your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a century, the levelers rip through every corner of Mirrodin, obeying the commands of an unseen master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Untap another target artifact. {3}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Locks want to be opened, and treasure wants to be free." - Nayrex Slipfinger, master thief

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an artifact or creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All who listen hear their own song, a unique melody played just for them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Vanquisher's Banner enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Taj-Nar, throne of Raksha Golden Cub, destined leader of the leonin prides.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C}. {5}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped. When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard. {T}: Add {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U}.) Mystic Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Islands. When Mystic Sanctuary enters the battlefield untapped, you may put target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R}. {2}{R}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Ramunap Ruins deals 2 damage to each opponent.
